metadata.title: Easy Homemade Pancake Recipe With COFFEE-MATE French Vanilla

text: Turn your camping trip to glamping with this easy-to-use COFFEE-MATE hack.
Sift dry ingredients (flour, baking powder, salt) together.
In a separate bowl, stir together egg and butter. Then stir in COFFEE-MATE French Vanilla Liquid and milk.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry and mix gently until just combined.
Using a funnel or pouring carefully, pour the mixture into an empty COFFEE-MATE Liquid bottle.  Keep refrigerated until ready to use!
To make your glamping experience extra special, top with berries and whipped cream.
